eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Virginia; AT 09:49 PM ON OCT 13, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:49 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a test of the Virginia Emergency Alert system. In the event of an emergency, this system would bring you important information.
